body: As evidence that this is a race condition, these events all seem to occur at right around midnight-UTC, which I think is [when we run the cronjob that clears old recipes](https://github.com/mozilla-services/cloudops-deployment/blob/5092b6c423c07bcfa6832532bc810d62184167d0/projects/normandy/puppet/modules/normandy/manifests/admin_cron.pp).
body_text: As evidence that this is a race condition, these events all seem to occur at right around midnight-UTC, which I think is when we run the cronjob that clears old recipes.
body_html: As evidence that this is a race condition, these events all seem to occur at right around midnight-UTC, which I think is when we run the cronjob that clears old recipes.
